meanings.definition: Outfits or clothing worn by a person.
meanings.sent1: She picked out her favorite getups for the party.
meanings.sent3: The dog tried on different getups for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of vintage getups was impressive.
meanings.sent5: The superhero's colorful getups caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: The act of getting dressed or putting on clothes.
meanings.sent1: Getting ready in the morning includes putting on your getups.
meanings.sent2: His getups were neatly laid out for the next day.
meanings.sent3: The robot's automated getups system malfunctioned comically.
meanings.sent4: The morning rush made putting on his getups a challenge.
meanings.sent5: The ballet dancer's graceful movements showcased her elegant getups.
